channel.title: Abouts on Enrique Acosta Jaramillo
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Enrique Acosta Jaramillo

item.title: About This Blog
item.description: I have a Ph.D in pure math and work as a content developer, translator and consultant. I like to always be learning new things (like for example how to make my own personal blog site!), and I am trying out writing about these personal excursions. I think I will enjoy it. Making it public in case anyone finds any of it useful/interesting! Contact me if you have any questions or comments about what you find.
